content: a simple easy beginner crochet pattern can be worked up in about an hour if you are more experienced in crocheting there are a few tricky bits in this pattern like crocheting in the sides of your work there are likely some tutorials for this online as long as your work isn t too tight or too loose and out of shape all should be well finished size is 6 x 6 i made two dishcloths with the yarn specified please always use cotton yarn for dishcloths as others aren t as absorbent and have microplastics
